title: Poland broke EU law logging ancient forest
text:
Poland broke EU law logging ancient forest 10:32am EDT - 01:25 
The European Union's highest court ruled on Tuesday that Poland broke EU environmental law with large-scale logging in the Bialowieza forest, an ecologically important World Heritage site and home to the rare European bison.   
The European Union's highest court ruled on Tuesday that Poland broke EU environmental law with large-scale logging in the Bialowieza forest, an ecologically important World Heritage site and home to the rare European bison.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/04/17/poland-broke-eu-law-logging-ancient-fore?videoId=418649432&videoChannel=14073
